KnowledgeBase.Title: isExact
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isInteger isZero integer isNull isInexact isNegative isPositive isOdd isEven

Function.Description: The isExact function returns true if its argument that can be expressed as an Integer with no fraction with losing significance, otherwise false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isExact function returns true if its argument that can be expressed as an Integer with no fraction with losing significance, otherwise false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isExact function is used to determine if a numeric argument is an exact Integer with no fraction. The opposite function is isInexact.

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the argument can be expressed Integer with no fractional part
